mapper.update: update researcher set laboratory_id = #{laboratoryId}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, title = #{title}, age = #{age}, orientation = #{orientation} where employee_id = #{employeeId}
mapper.select:
select employee_id, l.name laboratory_name, r.name as name, gender, age from researcher r join laboratory l on r.laboratory_id = l.id
